additionalType: ecrro:****type***** have to sort out abbreviations and context lookups for opaque ecrro URIs
name: text
description: Put description of the resource here, and remove this note. This resource type is not restricted only to source code, but the sdo type is included to use properties on the sdo:softwareSourceCode type
datePublished: [A date value in ISO 8601 date format]

license.name: use if creativeWork
license.url: use if CreativeWork or URL; if use url, the value is a string

dcat:qualifiedRelation.name: relationship label here [this is an alternate way to represent related resources with some relationship semantics

ecrro:0000009 (citation): text: preferred citation for the described resource
dct:conformsTo: Specification(s)--ideally a URI for the described resource
ecrro:primaryPublication: URI identifying the publication, or foaf:Document?
